note.value: Previously unattested biblical passages in CPA

Bibliography: P. Nicolopoulos, The New Finds. Holy Monastery and Archdiocese of Sinai (Athens, 1999), p. 144 ; C. Müller-Kessler, “1.4.9 Christian Palestinian Aramaic Translation,” in A. Lange and E. Tov (eds.), Textual History of the Hebrew Bible, Leiden: Brill, 2016), pp. 447-456 ; C. Müller-Kessler, “A Palimpsest Fragment with Unattested Passages of Job 3:11c-4:3b in Christian Palestinian Aramaic under Sinai, Greek NF MG 14,” Collectanea Christiana Orientalia 17, 2020, pp. 183-196 [DOI: 10.21071/cco.v17i0.1146]
